alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Madison; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern East Carroll, northwestern Madison, northeastern Richland and southwestern West Carroll Parishes through 415 PM CDT... At 317 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Holly Ridge, or 10 miles northeast of Rayville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Warden around 335 PM CDT. Epps around 340 PM CDT. Darnell around 345 PM CDT. Monticello around 350 PM CDT. Sondheimer around 415 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Madison; Richland; West Carroll
